summary: Build a website matching the provided "Gupta’s Stationery | Elite Pro ERP" HTML exactly, including inventory and billing functionality, and add a password-only login gate (password: "gupta123") before entering the main app (no Internet Identity).
architectural_notes: Front-end only single-page app (HTML/CSS/JS) with state persisted in browser localStorage (inventory, sales history, profile image).
Two main views/sections: Inventory and Billing Station, toggled via sidebar navigation.
Add a simple client-side password gate ("gupta123") before rendering the SPA; no Internet Identity integration.

existing_features.title: Recreate the provided single-page “Gupta’s Stationery | Elite Pro ERP” application in the React + TypeScript frontend with the same layout, styling, animations, and interactions as the supplied HTML/CSS (sidebar + main view, cards, tables, hover/active states, gradients, blur effects, spacing, typography).

Implement the sidebar header features: circular profile image with gradient ring, click-to-upload image, store/reload the selected profile image from browser localStorage using the same key behavior as the provided script (key: "g_p"), and display a live clock/date string updating every second in the sidebar.

Implement view switching exactly as in the provided app: “Inventory” and “Billing Station” navigation items in the sidebar, with active styling and a main header area that changes title and subtitle appropriately when switching views.

Implement Inventory management features matching the provided JavaScript behavior: add stock (name, unit price, qty), Enter-key focus shifting/submit behavior, inventory table rendering with sorting and search filtering by product name, delete item with confirmation, and “Total Asset Value” calculation and display.

Implement Billing Station features matching the provided JavaScript behavior: product search with suggestion dropdown from inventory, pick suggestion to populate name and price, add items to a current cart, render cart table with subtotals and remove buttons, compute and display bill total, and finalize bill to create a sales record and decrement inventory quantities.

Implement Past Transactions History rendering and metrics exactly as in the provided JavaScript: render sales sorted newest-first, compute and display “Today’s Sales” total for current date and “Gross Earnings” for all time, and allow deleting/voiding a transaction with confirmation.

Keep the backend canister minimal and do not introduce new product features beyond what the provided HTML implements; the app’s state persistence should match the original behavior (browser localStorage keys: "g_inv", "g_sales_v10", "g_p").
Add a password-only login gate that blocks access to the main ERP application until the user enters the exact password "gupta123", and do not use Internet Identity for this login.
Implement a logout action that returns the user to the password login screen and clears the stored authenticated session state.

Ensure the existing Inventory and Billing Station features and their browser localStorage persistence keys remain unchanged ("g_inv", "g_sales_v10", "g_p") and continue working after adding the password gate.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the Gupta’s Stationery | Elite Pro ERP website by copying the provided design and all features 100% (inventory management + billing station) with no changes.
Add a password-only login screen/gate (password: "gupta123") required before accessing the main application; do not use Internet Identity.
